content.text: Hi! I'm looking for new friends.
It's nice to meet you too! What are your hobbies?
I love to draw, paint, and go shopping. What about you?
I love to draw and paint too! I also love to go to India often.
That's so cool! I've never been to India, but I've always wanted to go.
You should go! It's a beautiful country with so much to see and do.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What are some of your favorite things to draw or paint?
I love to draw and paint landscapes, flowers, and animals.
Me too! I love drawing animals, especially dogs.
Dogs are the best! I have one myself.
I love dogs! What kind of dog do you have?
I have a golden retriever named Buddy.
Oh my gosh, Buddy is such a cute name!
Thanks! He's a really sweet dog.
I bet he is! I love dogs so much.
